text: SummerSlam (2011) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on August 14, 2011 at the Staples Center in Los Angeles, California. It was the 24th yearly SummerSlam event held by WWE and the last pay-per-view of the first brand extension, which ended on August 29. There were eight matches on the card. In the main event, CM Punk defeated John Cena to become the Undisputed WWE Champion. Triple H was the special guest referee. After the match, Alberto Del Rio cashed in his Money in the Bank briefcase and defeated Punk to win the WWE Championship. == Results == ==References== ==Other websites== *Official SummerSlam 2011 website Category:2011 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Los Angeles Category:SummerSlam Category:2011 in American television Category:2010s in Los Angeles, California Category:August 2011 events Category:2011 in California
title: SummerSlam (2011)
